# Sprint (Ex)
## Overview
*Sprint (Ex)*: Once per rage, the barbarian can use a single full-round run action to move up to 6 times her speed or a single full-round charge action to move up to 3 times her speed. A barbarian must have the [[Swift Foot (Ex)|swift foot]] rage power and be at least 4th level before selecting this rage power.

**Source:** Ultimate Combat, pg. 28
